description: Try our easy to follow Asian Prawn, Lychee & Coriander Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Asian Prawn, Lychee & Coriander Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g cooked fresh tiger prawns, peeled, deveined
1 cup snow pea shoots (or snow pea sprouts)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine lime juice, fish sauce and sugar in a small bowl and whisk well until sugar dissolves. Add eschalot and chilli and mix well to combine. Set aside.
Place snow peas in a bowl. Pour boiling water over and stand for 1 minute. Drain and refresh under cold, running water.

Combine prawns, lychees, coriander leaves, snow pea shoots or sprouts and sliced snow peas on a bed of lettuce leaves. Drizzle dressing over salad, scatter with shallots, if using, and serve immediately.
